entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Duplicate information in structured json logs #104409
  • Building a dotnet new iOS app on the command line on a Mac fails with a Windows path in the nuget.config file #104402
  • .NET 9: Android application crashes in release mode with Skiasharp #104397
    9.0.0
  • [6.0] Failure in DnsGetHostAddresses_PostCancelledToken_Throws: No such host is known #104392
  • [Mono/WASM] `Marshal.GetFunctionPointerForDelegate` crashes the runtime #104391
  • [6.0] Failure in BackwardsCompatibility_DowngradeToHttp11: no exception thrown #104390
  • Error message for missing service registration is misleading when using AddHttpClient<> #104386
  • [API Proposal]: Provide a way to get delegated credentials handle (linux client -> linux server scenario) #104385
  • AiaAcceptsCertTypesAndIgnoresNonCertTypes test failure in CI #104375
  • Duplicate AOT/Trimmer warnings for console apps #104374
  • Improve diagnostics for disabled TLS 1.3 ciphersuites for QUIC #104373
  • Unable to resolve type: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHostApplicationLifetime #104372
  • SYSLIB1045 Quick fix generates badly formed string #104371
    Future
  • [ARM][ARM64] Problems with empty struct passing #104369
  • [Test Failure] RemoteExecutionException: Half-way through waiting for remote process #104366
  • [API Proposal]: allow to escape invalid xml characters during xml serialization #104362
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/Arrays/misc/arrres_il_r/arrres_il_r.cmd #104351
  • [NativeAOT] Enable object stack allocation #104350
    9.0.0
  • wasm-test-browser Connection refused in 127.0.0.1 #104349
  • [runtime-extra-platforms] tvos arm64 mono net.dot.JIT_Directed application failing with DllNotFoundException: EmptyStructsLib #104348
  • [runtime-extra-platforms] tvossimulator-x64 mono failure in CultureName_Set_Invalid_ThrowsCultureNotFoundException: no exception thrown #104346
  • [NativeAOT] Object synchronization method was called from an unsynchronized block of code. #104340
  • runtime-community: linux-ppc64le mono failure in BinaryFormatTests.FormatterTests.BinaryFormatterTests.ValidateAgainstBlobs - outdated stored blob #104338
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/ObjectStackAllocation/ObjectStackAllocationTests/ObjectStackAllocationTests.cmd #104337

Closed

  • GC commits twice the limit when using large pages #103203
    9.0.0
  • Regular expression doesn't match properly with numeric backreference to a named capture group #104398
  • Failure in GC\API\NoGCRegion\Callback_Svr\Callback_Svr.cmd #100149
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/threading/coverage/OSThreadId/osthreadid/osthreadid.sh #73854
    9.0.0
  • Assert failure: !PreemptiveGCDisabled() #70307
    9.0.0
  • [Tracking] Expose a `Lock` type #87673
    9.0.0
  • [Experiment] Exception handling performance #77568
    9.0.0
  • Porting NativeAOT exception handling implementation to CoreCLR #85119
    9.0.0
  • Possible memory leak in .Net 8.0.2 #99304
    9.0.0
  • [GC] DATAS Tuning to improve pauses and heap volatility #93891
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 4 Regressions on 2/25/2024 4:37:10 PM #99002
  • Test failure: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_49982/test49982/test49982.sh #91096
    9.0.0
  • Why doesn't CLR immediately release local objects that leave the scope? #102109
  • High Memory Usage on AMD EPYC 7282 Compared to Intel Xeon E5-2630 v4 with .NET 8.0 #97126
  • Environment.FailFast in .NET 8 Container Yields Segmentation Fault (Exit Code 139) #102785
  • [API Proposal]: Support iterating as span over Dictionary and HashSet #104347
  • Error MSB6006: "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797. #102205
  • Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) on Entity Framework running inside docker container on arm32 #100462
  • `System.Memory.Tests` - segfault on coreclr Ubuntu/x64 #95103
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\unittests\\Baadbaad\\Baadbaad.cmd #93847
  • Test failure profiler/gc/gcbasic/gcbasic.sh #91568
    9.0.0
  • Test failure GC/Scenarios/DoublinkList/dlcollect/dlcollect.sh #95434
  • NativeAOT produces static library that makes ld crash #88032
    9.0.0
  • PhysicalFileProviderTests.TokensFiredOnFileDeleted fails #101401
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_13910/GitHub_13910/GitHub_13910.cmd #95713
  • MethodTable::IsClassInited returns false for <PrivateImplementationDetails> class #104247
  • DirectoryNotFoundException - Throws Misleading Exception When Path to File is Provided Instead of Directory #101632
  • Find out exact ordering of hiragana/katakana letters in native apple platforms #86636
    Future
  • AccessViolationException when using System.Numerics.Vector3 on net481 #104341
  • Make `System.Text.Json.Serialization.JsonConverter::.ctor` reflection-free #104367
  • Test failure in DecryptEnvelopedOctetStringWithExtraData (linux x64) #94067
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression on 6/25/2024 5:29:23 PM #104107
  • System.Net.Tests.HttpWebRequestTest_Async.GetResponseAsync_ParametersAreNotCachable_CreateNewClient test fails #100912
    9.0.0
  • Time-outs in `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests` on Windows/arm64 CoreCLR #100328
    9.0.0
  • HttpClient (using SocketsHttpHandler) may cause unobserved IOException that cannot be caught #104324
    9.0.0
  • SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_Http11_Cancellation_Test.ConnectionFailure_AfterInitialRequestCancelled_SecondRequestSucceedsOnNewConnection fails #93413
    9.0.0
  • [x64] Mono SIMD codegen bug #97176
    Future
  • [mono] Android x64: No pending exception expected: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException #92000
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'varDsc->lvLiveInOutOfHndlr' in 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections.SegmentedDictionary` in LSRA #104315
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] NAOT iOS HelloWorld size: 4 Regressions on 5/15/2024 8:03:38 AM #104074
  • Investigate ways to make GC stress compatible with WaitForPendingFinalizers #101150
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 6/27/2024 6:42:30 AM #104303
  • RuntimeMethodHandle.FromIntPtr and RuntimeFieldHandle.FromIntPtr Allocates GC Memory #103601
  • Issue with LDAP connection on RHEL\Rocky #102757
  • outerloop: System.IO.Tests on linux-musl-x64 AOT running into SIGKILL #102800
    Future
  • System.Range package similar to System.ValueTuple #28285
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests.TestWindowStyle tests failing #100647

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #104408
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Use ConcurrentDictionary to avoid threading issues #104407
    area-System.ComponentModel, 9.0.0
  • Check for `IDispatch` properly #104406
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix some ssize_t -> handle casts #104404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow LARGE_REGION_FACTOR to be configurable #104403
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Try and handle a basic address mode folding operation #104401
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor WinHttpHandler test to use LoopbackServer.CreateClientAndServer #104400
    area-System.Net
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 3: Remove zlib and zlib-intel source code and license mentions #104399
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Arm64/Sve: Do not mark *Prefetch* APIs as MEMORY_LOAD #104396
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #104395
    needs-area-label
  • Reduce allocations in Quic/HTTP3 #104394
    area-System.Net.Quic, 9.0.0
  • Error out when the size of a field is too big #104393
    needs-area-label
  • [WIP][mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift struct lowering in direct P/Invoke returns #104389
    NO-MERGE, arch-arm64, arch-x64, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix an issue with complex number parsing #104388
    area-System.Numerics
  • Small clean up in gtMarkAddrMode #104387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid unobserved task exceptions in Http tests #104384
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Add support for AES-GCM and ChaCha20Poly1305 on iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst via CryptoKit #104383
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [iOS][HybridGlobalization] Disable CultureName_Set_Invalid_ThrowsCultureNotFoundException test #104382
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Add RetryHelper to AIA test #104381
    area-System.Security
  • [wasi] sdk22 path #104379
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • CodeQL spillStack #104376
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Transform multi-reg args to FIELD_LIST in physical promotion #104370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve build error on systems that have a 32-bit time_t #104368
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Reimplement LINQ ToList using SegmentedArrayBuilder to reduce allocations #104365
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Use the maskBaseType when consuming a mask directly as part of KORTEST #104364
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] default WasmDebugLevel to 0 for tests #104361
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix access to hoisted variables from reductions #104360
    area-System.Linq.Expressions, community-contribution
  • [QUIC&H/3] QuicConnection handshake timeout #104358
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm] Enable `WasmTemplateTests` #104357
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Fix mono_wasm_load_runtime cwrap signature #104356
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Android] Resolve Android-specific System.Net.Security active issues #104352
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Make CertLoader reject duplicate attributes #104344
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface2::GetObjectExceptionData #104343
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix syntax of exports file with no exported symbols on Linux #104339
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not encode safe points with -1 offset. #104336
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix the build for FEATURE_GDBJIT #104380
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Rewrite how ConditionalSelect wraps the embedded mask operations #104248
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Use the new lock type in TimerQueue #103104
    area-System.Threading
  • Complex.Sqrt comply with IEEE 754 and use double.Hypot #104262
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Add ShiftRightArithmeticForDivide #104279
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #103807
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Configuration] #103805
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0][browser] drop old npm dependencies #104359
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Use Math.SinCos and Math.Exp in Complex #104313
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Update ESRP Code Signing #103896
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Update ESRP Code Signing #103895
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label
  • A few more net8 to net9 renames #104342
    area-Meta
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Detect class inited status more correctly in prestub/jitinterface #104253
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Check values before looping #104273
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Support using the system rapidjson to build #101443
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Enable QUIC client cert tests on Windows Server 2022 #104298
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Avoid UnobservedTaskExceptions from `HttpConnection.PrepareForReuse` #104335
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Add support for `SwiftIndirectResult` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104111
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Ensure mini-amd64 correctly handles CMP_GT and CMP_GE for OP_XCOMPARE_FP #104206
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Adding support for morphing associative hwintrinsics #104224
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize multicast delegate thunk #104222
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Compute EH liveness on all blocks instead of RPO blocks #104321
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Make GC stress usable with Libraries tests #103738
    test-enhancement, area-VM-coreclr
  • NativeAOT/Windows/Arm64: Add TLS inline support #104282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip calling not implemented PEAssembly::GetDisplayName in DAC #104326
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Poly fill Index and Range types #104170
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Normalize the creation of simd comparison nodes and give basic constant folding support #104215
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Have morph normalize patterns to GT_NEG and GT_NOT #104214
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2488323 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [HttpClientFactory] Do not log query string by default #103769
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • (WIP) Arm64/SVE: Implemented `AddRotateAcross` and `AddSequentialAcross` #104258
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add standard tags to HttpClient native trace instrumentation #104251
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [cdac] start of RuntimeTypeSystem contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Improve `JsonNode.DeepEquals` numeric equality. #104255
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add Utf8JsonReader.AllowMultipleValues and related APIs. #104328
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • fix the size passed to grow_heap_segment from loh_allocate_in_condemned #103998
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add a config flag to experiment with some work item prioritization changes in cases involving a lot of sync-over-async #103983
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • [8.0] Add a config flag to experiment with some work item prioritization changes in cases involving a lot of sync-over-async #103984
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.x
  • Integrate SimdUnicode for AVX-512 #104199
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge 1ES templates #103366
    area-Infrastructure
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove unnecessary endianness dependent logic #104332
    area-System.Memory
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add support for other same size vector bitcasts to Mono #104309
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • (WIP) Arm64/SVE: Implemented `ConvertToSingle` and `ConvertToDouble` #104259
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [cdac] Start Loader contract and implement ISOSDacInterface::GetModuleData in cDAC #104257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Lower GetElement on arm64 to the correct access sequence #104288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.ConditionalExtract* APIs #104150
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #103267
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-codeflow
  • Update EOL versions (8.0-staging) #103393
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Generate forwarder if all parameters can't be marshaled in LibraryImport #104246
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [nomerge] [GC] Add verification and logging to region_free_list #104061
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/8.0 staging] Port fix for 103477 to 8.0 #103918
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.8
  • Backport fix for MethodImpl removal when interfaceImpl is removed #103432
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #104330
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Update-eol-versions-6.0-staging #103380
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify Emit SignatureHelper WriteSimpleSignature #104220
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Only build applicable build Tasks when building the repo #104226
    area-Infrastructure
  • Use new [Interceptable] ctor for source gen #104180
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add a disabled-by-default implementation of strength reduction #104243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize VectorX<T>.ConditionalSelect for constant masks #104092
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] JIT: pass structs according to floating-point calling convention properly #104237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clean up procfs.h mess on sunos and illumos #104304
    area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Remove uses of CLRJIT_AZ_KEY/clrjit_key1 from SPMI #104164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Switch uses of `DomainAssembly` that just need `Assembly` to use `Assembly` #104334
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add support for `SwiftSelf<T>` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104171
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASIp2 + wasi:http #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [wasm] Disallow not useful configuration combinations #104149
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable bulk memory by default and as a baseline #2628

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Permission Denied or Access Denied when running a global dotnet tool #41947
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #41938

Closed

  • [NETE2ESDK][Azure Linux 3.0] Installing .NET 9 Preview SDK in Azure Linux X64 3.0 Preview should not depend on package netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1 #41898

PullRequests

Created

  • Add xunit configuration to increase test logging #41963
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41962
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • JsonPropertyPostAction: allow to create file and path #41959
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Use PackageDownload in torn builds #41951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [WIP] [IGNORE] #41948
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41942
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41941
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41940
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #41939
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #41933
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR: Update .gdnbaselines with new aspire entries #41943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to the 8.0.6 build #41937
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41929
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix 15 packages to track their own versions through darc #41890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Moved src/Assets to test/TestAssets #41924
    untriaged, Area-dotnet new
  • Update CentOS tags in 8.0.3xx #40216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Clean up STJ references Fixes #39902 #40645
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2488158 #41887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix detection of torn SDK #41907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #41927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Anonymous Interface Objects #4301
  • Proposal: `field` keyword in properties #140
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: First-Class Span Types #7905
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Rename semi-auto-properties.md to reflect new feature name #8264
  • Update field-keyword.md #8265
  • Add detailed design to clarify the field keyword spec and incorporate all LDM decisions #8069

Updated

  • Start proposal for more constant types #8257

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IntelliCode-suggested completions don't escape keywords properly #74253
  • An instance of analyzer System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.JsonSourceGenerator cannot be created from C:\ Users\sacsharm\.nuget\packages\system.text.json\6.0.0\analyzers\dotnet\roslyn3.11\cs\System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.dll #74252

Closed

  • Automatically rename file while renaming containing type #71465
  • Task List filtering for current project doesn't work as expected #74074
  • Exception during execution of AsyncTests.Imported_AsyncWithEH terminates test process #72437
  • CS8073 | Analyzer says the expression is always false, but I say otherwise #71661
  • Show minimum size of class/struct type as hint when hovering for C# #71804
  • Quick actions and refactoring - generate exception class creates obsolete code #71803
  • Calling non `readonly` method on `ref readonly` variable is allowed and Compiler creates a copy, making changes invisible to the user without any warning #74259
  • Run a single generator at a time #74086
    17.12
  • .AsIncrementalGenerator extension method #74039
    17.12
  • Accessibility issue in document outline window. #73810
    17.11 P3
  • [BUG] When i rename record param, not rename all references #72581
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve performance of SourceText.LineInfo indexer. #74267
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove (already disabled) command handlers related to 'add suppression' menu command. #74266
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix style binding failure in Document Outline #74263
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Reduce closures allocated during invocation of CapturedSymbolReplacement.Replacement #74258
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct, ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudUpdateProduct #56613
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #56612
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #56611
  • Perf improvement: json, mapaction, mvc #56610
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter #56609
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #56608
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware, mapaction, mvc #56607
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #56606
  • Perf improvement: caching, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #56605
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware, plaintext #56604
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter #56603
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #56602
  • basic Hot Reload fails when modifying razor pages in external library/project #56600
  • NavigationManager.BaseUri returns incorrect value with Query Parameters #56598
  • Blazor server closes when downloading a file with Libre Wolf browser exited with code 4294967295 (0xffffffff). #56596
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter, plainTextWithFilter #56588
  • Introduce `IParameterBindingMetadata` to remove unbounded reflection in EndpointMetadataApiDescriptionProvider #56587
  • .NET 9 OpenAPI doesn't seem to export schemas (e.g. types) #56586
  • MinimalApis using MapGroup are not exposed by the .NET 9 WithOpenApi method #56585
  • Expose additional info about properties and JSON types in OpenApiSchemaTransformerContext #56584
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #56405
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #56529
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #56589
  • I have searched the existing issues #56595
  • Identity RemoveClaimsAsync(userById, claimsToRemove) method is resetting the primary key to the last removed claim's primary key #56476
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #56538

PullRequests

Created

  • Add an option on the `ExceptionHandlerOptions` to select status codes based on exceptions #56616
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Revert "Quarantine flaky MVC functional tests (#55935)" #56615
    area-mvc
  • Remove LINQ usage from OpenAPI comparers #56599
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Add test for the order of activity and metrics with HTTP requests #56592
    area-hosting

Merged

  • Add more logging to StreamPool_ManyConcurrentStreams_StreamPoolFull #56570
    area-networking, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Support IAsyncEnumerable<T> and ChannelReader<T> with ValueTypes in SignalR native AOT #56583
    area-signalr
  • [release/8.0] Chain runtime .Msi's instead of .Exe's in hosting bundle #56459
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Perf: ReasonPhrases as Array instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add overloads for problem and validation problem results that accept `IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<,>>` #56368
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Use Ascii.ToUtf16 in StringUtilities #56578
    area-networking
  • Add support for trusting dev certs on linux #56582
    area-networking
  • [Blazor] Allow streams to get disposed while being transmitted to the browser #56557
    area-blazor
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.7.24351.1 #56546
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump ws from 7.5.9 to 7.5.10 #56275
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a7f443b` to `1d17ea1` #56232
    area-infrastructure
  • Update azure-pipelines-mirror-within-azdo.yml for 8.0 #56456
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update azure-pipelines-mirror-within-azdo.yml for 8.0 #56457
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Set OpenApiServers object in document #56470
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Review Opacity as it relates to ContainerView #23418
    Backlog
  • Custom handler/behavior doesn't work right inside custom controls. #23417
  • [iOS] FilePicker allows seletion of Javascript (*.js) files when filter is set to only allow public.plain-text #23415
  • [Android] DnsSafeHost - System Invalid Exception for Shell Navigation Current State on Android. It doesn't render UI for the next page. #23414
  • iOS - Layout overlay - Not delegating touch events #23413
  • [iOS] Application cannot be reset back to system theme #23411
  • Add SweepGradientBrush & SweepGradientPaint #23410

Closed

  • Unable to scroll Horizontal GridItemsLayout in CollectionView with a mouse wheel #22659
    .NET 8 SR7
  • WebView is not showing web pages properly #22994

PullRequests

Created

  • Fire Navigation Events on Root Window Page #23420
  • Android: Ensure fragment has not been disposed while updating left bar button #23416
    community ✨
  • Make sure resizetized image files are writable #23412

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix horizontal scroll not working w/ CollectionView #23188
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, area-controls-scrollview

Updated

  • [iOS] Crash upon resuming the app - fix #23360
    area-core-lifecycle, platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, community ✨, migration-compatibility
  • [android]: ModalContainer Destroy commit allowing state loss #23400
    community ✨
  • `Element`: NRE by accessing `RealParent` - fix #23405
    community ✨
  • [net9] Bring changes from p6 release branch back into net9.0 #23404
  • [iOS] Fix Button image sizing and layout #22476
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area-controls-button
  • Fixed scroll to group item on Android + Windows #16704
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, stale, Under Consideration
  • If PlatformView has been removed use index #23408
  • [Windows] Respect `ClearButtonVisibility = ClearButtonVisibility.Never` for `<Entry>`s #23158
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] InputTransparent="true" on a Layout breaks child controls - Fix #22345
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • [tests] Analyzer / code fix provider for UITest [Test] without [Category] #23287
    area-infrastructure, area-testing
  • [Binding SG] Add an API for creating instances of TypedBinding #23239
    area-xaml, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Binding SG] Dogfood binding source generator in the MAUI codebase #23393
  • [windows] fix memory leak in `MauiWinUIWindow` #23327
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, memory-leak 💦
  • Run UI tests per groups of categories in CI #22609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Why Unknown error 258 is not in SqlServerRetryingExecutionStrategy retryable error numbers. #34154
  • Cosmos: Update pipeline doesn't support primitive collections over value-converted elements #34153
  • Share optimizations between relational and non-relational providers #34152
    Backlog
  • SQL optimization/simplification in 9.0 #34151
    9.0.0
  • Comparing expressions can be slow #34149
    Backlog
  • Cosmos: Stop generating discriminator predicate when querying all mapped types of a container (and the discriminator is complete) #34148
    Backlog

Closed

  • Support map property to view and ignore it on table #34147
  • Cosmos: Implement proper source alias management #33894
    9.0.0
  • Should cascade delete work when specifying custom class for join entity #34136
  • Cannot constrain max length of a text field in a model #34150
  • Indexes are created by default for foreign keys in non-relational databases #34053
    9.0.0
  • The Cosmos provider ignores configured indexes #34023
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Some minor Cosmos cleanup #34155
  • Add UnsafeAccessor support for generic types #34146

Merged

  • Implement Cosmos alias management #34074
  • Simplify `NOT` #34142
    community-contribution
  • Use XOR to translate some == and != expressions #34124
    community-contribution
  • Index convention changes for non-relational providers #34054
    providers-beware
  • [release/6.0] Clean up YAML #34095
    tell-mode
  • Update branding to 6.0.33 #34140
  • Update branding to 8.0.8 #34141

Updated

  • Pack of minor Cosmos changes #34143
  • Lock the database while executing Migrate() #34115
  • Don't use service discovery for DbContext types if corresponding IDesignTimeDbContextFactory implementations are found. #34082
  • Cosmos: Stop nesting results in extra JSON object #34044
  • [WIP] Translation of TimeOnly.FromTimeSpan on SQL Server no-op #34114
  • Use null propagation to optimize away `IS NOT NULL` checks #34127
  • Cosmos: Stop generating discriminator clause when not needed #34145
  • Fix for #34117, Improve Hash Code Distribution for RelationalCommandCache Keys #34118
  • Support vector search on Cosmos DB #33991
    blocked
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #34144
  • Add SqlServer DATEPART support for Microsecond and Nanosecond properties. #34135
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis version to 4.10 #34116
